means: <贬>潜伏，偷偷摸摸地走动，鬼鬼祟祟地活动( skulk的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: You, meanwhile, will be skulking in the safety of the car.
sentence.Network_cn: 与此同时，你会安全地藏在汽车里。

sentence.Network_en: There was someone skulking behind the bushes.
There were half a dozen foxes skulking in the undergrowth.
sentence.Network_cn: 在林下灌丛中潜伏着五六只狐狸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: now wait a minute对什么事情不满skulking鬼鬼祟祟so-and-so某某人，某某
after a while it went on its way , although Johansson suspects it is still skulking around the neighbourhood .一会后它便走掉了，尽管约翰逊仍然怀疑这只鹿仍在四周徘徊。

21. Vermin skulk. 跳蚤群22. Kitten kindle. 小猫群23. Quail bery or coney. 鹌鹑群24. Walrus pod. 海象群25. Lark exaltation. 云雀群26. Seal trip.
The vanquished rooster skulked and hid himself in a quiet corner ., 被征服的公鸡躲藏以外 , 藏在一个安静的角落里.
To skulk around ; sneak ., 潜伏 ; 行为鬼崇.

entry.tran: 躲藏;潜伏;躲躲闪闪地走;鬼鬼祟祟地活动
entry.def: If you skulk somewhere, you hide or move around quietly because you do not want to be seen.

example.ex: You, meanwhile, will be skulking in the safety of the car...
example.tran: 与此同时，你会安全地藏在汽车里。

means.word_mean: 1. evading duty or work by pretending to be incapacitated;

sentences.sentence: "they developed a test to detect malingering"

means.word_mean: 1. marked by quiet and caution and secrecy; taking pains to avoid being observed;

auth_sentence.content: David had...followed her and Freytag about, skulking along very like a private detective.
auth_sentence.res_content: David had...followed her and Freytag about, skulking along very like a private detective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: David had...followed her and Freytag about, skulking along very like a private detective.

auth_sentence.content: After years of skulking in the shadows of disbelief it is about to claim its place in the sun.
auth_sentence.res_content: After years of skulking in the shadows of disbelief it is about to claim its place in the sun.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: After years of skulking in the shadows of disbelief it is about to claim its place in the sun.

auth_sentence.content: He did not emerge from the shadows and instead of skulking through the lobby doors of the hotel in Madhya Pradesh, he bounded.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did not emerge from the shadows and instead of skulking through the lobby doors of the hotel in Madhya Pradesh, he bounded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not emerge from the shadows and instead of skulking through the lobby doors of the hotel in Madhya Pradesh, he bounded.
